detail_desc: Calf-length wrap dress in sturdy satin with a deep V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Long balloon sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Ties at the waist and a wrapover skirt with a wide, flounced trim and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, flounced trims at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable fabric shoulder strap. One zipped outer compartment and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm, height 12.5 cm, width 19 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped, soft jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back and narrow shoulder straps.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton twill with embroidery on the front, an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with a button and buttons at the sides.
Elastic bracelets with wooden beads. One fabric bracelet with glass beads.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front in a relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fancy dress costume in scuba fabric with glittery details and a hat. The costume is in the design of a pineapple in a gently rounded shape with a slit at the back. Contrasting colour leaves in felted fabric at the top and a hook and loop fastening at the back. Hat with contrasting colour leaves in felted fabric at the top and a hook and loop fastening under the chin.

Short blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a wide neckline and pleats at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an open back with decorative gathers and ties. Unlined.

Calf-length coat in a quilted weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Earmuffs in faux fur and velour with a plastic headband covered in imitation leather. Polyester filling.
Straight-cut, woven shirt in a relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Tunic in a sturdy, jacquard-weave viscose blend with a pattern in shimmering metallic thread. V-neck, a pleat at the back for added width and short, wide sleeves.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are close-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper to the hems to create a flattering silhouette.
Poncho in an airy weave with a V-neck and fringed hem.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a loose yoke front and back, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft slub cotton knit with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, double-knitted cotton blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and tapered sleeves.
Lightweight jacket in woven fabric with a hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in mesh.
Cropped top in soft printed jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Lace dress with a boat neck, cap sleeves, zip at the back and seam at the waist with a velvet trim and decorative bow. Jersey lining.
Briefs in sturdy ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal and fabric earrings with tassels. Length 7.5 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Set with a top and trousers in a cotton knit. Top with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Small, printed football. Diameter approx. 14 cm.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Knee-length A-line skirt in imitation leather. High waist with press-studs and a concealed zip at one side, and decorative seams front and back. Unlined.

Studio Collection. Slim-fit trousers in a stretch weave made from a wool blend with a regular waist, belt loops and a tailored waistband with a safety button on the inside. Zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, extra-long legs with a high slit and buttons at the hems. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Short top in a ribbed viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Short-sleeved playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust, and pockets in the side seams.
Briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and full coverage at the back.
Metal hair clips with wavy edges.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, straight-cut, heavily draping dress in sequined chiffon made from recycled polyester. Deep, wrapover V-neck, wide, raglan balloon sleeves and wide, loose-fitting cuffs with pleats for added volume. Chiffon lining made from recycled polyester.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
3/4-length leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in a fine knit with a sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, ribbed cardigan in patterned, organic cotton jersey with a gathered yoke and two buttons at the top.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a rounded front, short dolman sleeves and no fasteners.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Fine-knit socks.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Trousers in an airy cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, a decorative bow at the front and side pockets with a pompom trim. Smocking and a small frill trim at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Cropped top in stretch, sequined jersey with narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Gently flared dress in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neckline and short sleeves.
Straight-cut tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Long, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hoop earrings in textured metal. Diameter 3 cm.
Blouse in a viscose weave with short puff sleeves and a V-neck with a wrapover front. Concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and gentle flare to the hem.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist with a frill trim and bow, and side pockets.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves. Small, overlocked frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with padded, triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners. Briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
